text: eprint sciences and Maharic Bio-Regenesis Technologies are the only methods by which regeneration of the DNA Strand Template–12 personal D-12 Pre-matter Divine Blueprint can occur to restore the individual’s direction connection to its D-12 Christos Avatar Identity.
